FreshRSS.description:
FreshRSS is a free, self-hostable aggregator for rss feeds.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PGID.description: GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

PUID.description: UID to run as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID
